theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.NAME: Kanshou
theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bakuya to your hand.
theHeroOfJustice:Kanchou.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Bakuya+ to your hand.

theHeroOfJustice:AzothSword.NAME: Azoth Sword
theHeroOfJustice:AzothSword.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Deal damage equal to your theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits to all enemies.{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !M! damage)}

theHeroOfJustice:Archery.NAME: Archery
theHeroOfJustice:Archery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If there is only one enemy, deal !D! damage again.

theHeroOfJustice:SwordRain.NAME: Sword Rain
theHeroOfJustice:SwordRain.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

theHeroOfJustice:SupportingFire.NAME: Supporting Fire
theHeroOfJustice:SupportingFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theHeroOfJustice:DesperateSwipe.NAME: Desperate Swipe
theHeroOfJustice:DesperateSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have no NL theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits, gain !M!.

theHeroOfJustice:MagneticWeapon.NAME: Magnetic Weapon
theHeroOfJustice:MagneticWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you use theheroofjustice:Projection, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

theHeroOfJustice:Reflection.NAME: Reflection
theHeroOfJustice:Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this combat was a theheroofjustice:Projection, gain [E].

theHeroOfJustice:StandBackUp.NAME: Stand Back Up
theHeroOfJustice:StandBackUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each debuff on you.

theHeroOfJustice:StrategyMeeting.NAME: Strategy Meeting
theHeroOfJustice:StrategyMeeting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits. NL Draw 2 more cards at the start of next turn. NL End your turn.

theHeroOfJustice:SurpassTheOriginal.NAME: Surpass
theHeroOfJustice:SurpassTheOriginal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength for each buff on the enemy.

theHeroOfJustice:SwordToss.NAME: Sword Toss
theHeroOfJustice:SwordToss.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card and gain theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits equal to its cost.

theHeroOfJustice:Caliburn.NAME: Caliburn
theHeroOfJustice:Caliburn.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

theHeroOfJustice:RhoAias.NAME: Rho Aias
theHeroOfJustice:RhoAias.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Gain Block equal to your theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits, twice.
theHeroOfJustice:RhoAias.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Gain Block equal to your theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits, three times.

theHeroOfJustice:RapidProjections.NAME: Rapid Projections
theHeroOfJustice:RapidProjections.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use theheroofjustice:Projection, draw !M! card.
theHeroOfJustice:RapidProjections.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use theheroofjustice:Projection, draw !M! cards.

theHeroOfJustice:Caladbolg.NAME: Caladbolg
theHeroOfJustice:Caladbolg.DESCRIPTION: theheroofjustice:Projection. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theHeroOfJustice:BeginChant.NAME: Begin Chant
theHeroOfJustice:BeginChant.DESCRIPTION: Add a 0-cost *Rho *Aias card to your hand. NL Add a *Continue *Chant to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theHeroOfJustice:ContinueChant.NAME: Continue Chant
theHeroOfJustice:ContinueChant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits and !M! Strength. NL Add a *Reality *Marble to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theHeroOfJustice:UnlimitedBladeWorks.NAME: Reality Marble
theHeroOfJustice:UnlimitedBladeWorks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theheroofjustice:Magic_Circuits. NL theheroofjustice:Projection cards cost 1 less Energy.

theHeroOfJustice:StructuralMastery.NAME: Structural Mastery
theHeroOfJustice:StructuralMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use theheroofjustice:Projection, gain !M! Strength.
theHeroOfJustice:StructuralMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use theheroofjustice:Projection, gain !M! Strength.
